name: DynamicEventButton
description: Retextures the Event button based on the current Event level.

noNameLabel.name: Hide Level Name
noNameLabel.description: Hides the level name from the button texture. <cy>Best used with texture packs like GD Clean by Asky.</c>

wordWrapping.name: Level Name Wrapping (Experimental)
wordWrapping.description: Wraps the level name to the next line if needed.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
